subject: Investing
title: Trade Wars and Tariff Impacts
description: Learn Trade Wars and Tariff Impacts in one minute.

hook.text: When the US slapped 25% tariffs on Chinese goods, both countries' stock markets stumbled for months.

buildup.text: Tariffs raise costs for importers, squeeze margins for exporters, and disrupt global supply chains.

discovery.text: Trade wars create winners and losers: tariffed countries suffer but alternative suppliers (Vietnam, India) gain.

twist.text: Companies often absorb tariffs or shift production, reducing the long-term impact below initial market panic.

climax.text: Global investors should hold diversified positions across trade blocs to hedge against shifting trade policies.

punchline.text: Trade walls rise and fall. Diversified portfolios navigate around them.

quiz.question: How do tariffs primarily affect global investors?
options: They raise costs and disrupt supply chains, hurting some and helping others
